H0.text: They are planting trees to replace the ones that are cut is one way people are helping the environment.

H1.text: They are building more roads so more people can see natural areas is one way people are helping the environment.

H2.text: They are building more dumps to hold the trash we create is one way people are helping the environment.

H3.text: They are using their cars more to get to places faster is one way people are helping the environment.

A4.text: Trees for the Future has assisted more than 170,000 families, in 6,800 villages of Asia, Africa and the Americas, to plant over 35 million trees.

A5.text: Wangari Maathai, 2004 Nobel Peace Prize recipient, founded the Green Belt Movement which planted over 47 million trees to restore the Kenyan environment.
